name: Robot Hop
description:
This is a game designed by my daughter (9yrs.) made for #LOWREZJAM 2017

You play as a robot on a tramboline. On your way up in the air and back down you try to collect as many bolts as you can. But be careful not to get blown off to the sides by the shifting winds.

My daughter did the game design and graphics. I only helped with the code.
